mapper.select: select * from search where search_code=2 and keyword=#{keyword}
mapper.update: update search set search_count=search_count+1 where search_code=2 and keyword=#{keyword}
mapper.insert: insert into search values(2, seq_search_num.nextval, #{keyword}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'),1)

select m.min_price, m.max_price, h.*, s.*, (select c.name from code c where c.bcd=200 and c.mcd=s.food_type) type_name, (select host_photo from hostphoto p where p.host_num = h.host_num and rownum=1) host_photo from host h, store s, (select host_num, min(menu_price) min_price, max(menu_price) max_price from menu group by host_num) m where h.host_num = s.host_num and s.host_num = m.host_num
and (host_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or host_addr like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or (select c.name from code c where c.bcd=200 and c.mcd=s.food_type) like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
host_addr like '%대정%' or host_addr like '%안덕%'
host_addr like '%서귀동%'
host_addr like '%성산%' or host_addr like '%우도%'
host_addr like '%노형%'
host_addr like '%중문%'
host_addr like '%표선%'
host_addr like '%한림%' or host_addr like '%애월%'
host_addr like '%조천%' or host_addr like '%구좌%'
and min_price < 10000
and min_price between 10000 and 29999
and min_price between 30000 and 49999
and min_price >= 50000
order by host_avg desc
order by like_count desc
order by min_price

host_addr like '%대정%' or host_addr like '%안덕%'
